TopicTitle: So I wanna start a tread for ideas and KSP vanilla Space Station builds. That follow realistic Ideas and design choices.

Articles.Content: So I wanted to start a discussion. On realistic designs and have a good collection of pics.centerd around station builds. And to add some challenge I want it to be completely in Stock KSP parts.

I would observe that stock and space station is quite limited to what can be done. Maybe include stock-a-like station parts mod? 

I haven't really built many stations, but the ones I have I have thrown up as a complete unit apart from one Mun base, where I put two things, landed them next to each other and docked them on the surface (I was impressed with myself that it worked). 

I was actually planning on building a stock station using my space shuttles soon, like a video I saw on youtube.
